block.endertrigon.baby_dragon_egg.use: Place down to spawn a tamed, baby Ender Dragon
block.endertrigon.dragon_horn.use: Use to call tamed baby Ender Dragons
gui.endertrigon.config.attacksUntilPerch:
Specifies the amount of special attacks, plus the amount of remaining end crystals, the dragon must do until it can potentially perch.
Range: 1 ~ 16
gui.endertrigon.config.crashPhaseDestroy: Specifies if the crash phase should cause blocks to be flung.
gui.endertrigon.config.enableCrashPlayer: Specifies if this custom dragon phase should be enabled or not
gui.endertrigon.config.enableDiveBombPla: Specifies if this custom dragon phase should be enabled or not
gui.endertrigon.config.enableSnatchPlaye: Specifies if this custom dragon phase should be enabled or not
gui.endertrigon.config.maxBabyEnderDrago:
Specifies the max amount of baby ender dragons the Ender Dragon can spawn during its hatching (dive bomb) phase.
Range: 1 ~ 16
Specifies if the landing phase should have a much higher chance to be skipped. Makes the fight quicker by avoiding long dull periods where the Ender Dragon is flying for a long time, before it perches.
